help_avatar_cdn: Choose where the plugin will acquire its Minecraft avatars.
help_avatar_size: The size in pixels to display Minecraft avatars.
error_avatar_size: Needs to be equal to or greater than 40.
help_avatar_style: Choose the style of Minecraft avatar, will default to Flat if the selected option is not supported by the selected Avatar CDN.
help_custom_cdn: The URL to fetch avatars from. Variables include {name}, {size}, and {style}.
help_server_name: Enter a name for the server that is at least 6 characters long.
error_server_name: Needs to be at least 6 characters long.
help_server_address: Enter the address that players use to connect to the server. Can be an IP, DNS, or SRV. Defaults to: 0.0.0.0:25565
error_server_address: Needs to be a valid IP, DNS, or SRV.
help_query_port: Enter the Query Port in server.properties. Defaults to: 25565. If you wish to use an external query service, enter it in the External API option below.
error_query_port: Needs to be a port between 1-65535.
help_rcon_port: Remote Control port for the server.
error_rcon_port: Needs to be a port between 1-65535.
help_rcon_pass: Remote Control password for the server.
error_rcon_pass: Needs to be a port between 1-65535.
help_xapi: Enter the address for your NodeBB-Integration Plugin for Bukkit, Bungeecord, Sponge, or Node.
error_xapi: Needs to be a valid IP, DNS, or SRV.
hide_plugins_help: This will prevent plugin data from being displayed on widgets and exposed to any API calls.
help_api_key: If you are using NodeBB-Integration on you Minecraft server, use this API Key to connect it to the forum. Click here for more help.
